scripts.build: babel --plugins=transform-class-properties,transform-es2015-modules-strip src/index.js --out-file build/cookie-notice.js && babel --plugins=transform-class-properties --presets=es2015 src/index.js --out-file build/cookie-notice.es5.js && babel --plugins=transform-class-properties,transform-es2015-modules-strip src/index.js --out-file docs/cookie-notice.js
